content: cosy socks knitted in my new dk sock yarn yarn is available here 1 yarn coopknits socks yeah dk 75% superwash merino wool 25% nylon 112m 122yds per 50g skein colour a 1 x 50g skein shown in 210 aeacus colour b 2 x 50g skeins shown in 209 demeter sizes to fit foot circumference 20 5 22 23 24 5 25 5 cm 8 8 5 9 9 5 10 in actual foot circumference of sock unstretched 18 19 20 5 22 23 cm 7 7 5 8 8 5 9 in length of leg to top of heel flap 13cm 5in foot length is fully adjustable within the pattern finished sock measures 0 5cm 0 25in less than actual foot length to ensure a good fit 1 http //coopknits bigcartel com/product/socks-yeah-dk
